actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the purpose of terminating the requirement for the prior approval of the export sales of agriculture commodities.

summary.text: Terminates the requirement under the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act that prior approval of the Secretary of Agriculture be obtained for export sales of feed grains, wheat, soybeans, or other agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973, as amended, for the purpose of terminating the requirement for the prior approval of the export sales of agriculture commodities.
